About Me

I'm Sourabh Bajaj. A masters student at Georgia Tech and a software developer at Lucena Research.

Education

M.S. Computer Science, Georgia Institute of Technology, Atlanta, Georgia, USA
GPA: 4.00 Graduation: Dec, 2013

B.E. Electrical and Electronics, Birla Institute of Technology and Science, Pilani, India
GPA: 3.66 Graduation: May, 2012

Skills
